document.full_text: a tax fraud case against italian prime minister silvio resumed on monday, but he did not attend court and won't be in the dock on wednesday when he goes on trial for paying for sex with an underage teenager.
document.title: berlusconi's trial battles resume without him
lines_and_colors: a tax fraud case against italian prime minister silvio resumed on monday, but he did not attend court and won't be in the dock on wednesday when he goes on trial for paying for sex with an underage teenager.
